synopsis.text: Knowing the perilous task at hand, Yukimura Chizuru disguises herself as a geisha and embarks on a covert mission in Shimabara for the Shinsengumi. Set between episodes 8 and 9 of Hakuoki's first season, this anime unfolds the intricate events leading up to, during, and after the operation through the unique perspectives of each captain - Okita Souji, Saitou Hajime, Harada Sanosuke, Toudou Heisuke, Hijikata Toshizou, and Kazama Chikage. As the story unfurls, the captains' involvement and that of a few demons in the affair come to light, revealing a complex web of intrigue and danger. With the Shinsengumi's trust placed firmly in Chizuru, the captains must confront their reservations and protect her at any cost, all while navigating the treacherous waters of rival clans and deadly demons.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
